alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Darke; Mercer; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WESTERN SHELBY, NORTHEASTERN DARKE, SOUTHWESTERN AUGLAIZE AND SOUTHERN MERCER COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located in southern Mercer County and northeast Darke County, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph, half inch hail, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Coldwater, New Bremen, Minster, St. Henry, Newport, Fort Loramie, Hardin, Russia, Osgood, Chickasaw, Burkettsville, North Star, Kettlersville, Montezuma, Yorkshire, Newbern, Egypt, Maria Stein, Willowdell and Lake Loramie State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
